actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that certain additional military service shall be deemed part of years of service of an individual for the computation of certain annuities.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to allow the inclusion of certain additional military service of an individual in computing his or her annuity as a railroad employee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that certain additional military service shall be deemed part of years of service of an individual for the computation of certain annuities.
